snippet: Gen. Éric Bellot des Minières, the commander of France’s military operation in the Central African Republic, says that security has improved considerably there and that the French authorities are studying plans for reducing troops.
abstract: France's commander of military operations in Central African Republic reports that security has improved in country and French authorities are contemplating troop reduction.
lead_paragraph: Gen. Éric Bellot des Minières, the commander of France’s military operation in the Central African Republic, says that security has improved considerably there and that the French authorities are studying plans for reducing troops.

headline.main: Central African Republic: Security Improving, French General Says
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: Security Improving, French General Says
